advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Read like you own every book in the world.

Scribd gives you unlimited access to more than half a million e-books and 30,000 audiobooks, including New York Times bestsellers, Pulitzer Prize winners, and reader favorites across every genre, as well as the personalized tools to help you find the ones you’ll love, all for $8.99 a month. Available in nearly every country and 80 languages on mobile, tablet & web. Even better, your first month is on us, so you can try us out risk-free.

Features
 • Unlimited access to more than half-a-million e-books.
 • Unlimited access to more than 30,000 audiobooks.
 • Personalized recommendations & thoughtful editors' picks recreate the feel of browsing a neighborhood bookstore.
 • Build your library and organize your books just the way you like them.
 • Sync between all your devices.
 • Millions of user-contributed documents, all easily searchable.

Want to see what we’re up to? Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Scribd
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/scribd

~ Praise for Scribd ~
"Movie lovers have Netflix, music lovers have Spotify -- and book lovers (whether they read literary fiction or best-selling potboilers) now have Scribd." 
– NPR

"[Scribd] is a place where you can browse and skim and read whatever strikes your fancy..." 
– WIRED

"For less than the price of buying one new book a month (e- or otherwise), you can wander through more than 50,000 books."
 -ENTREPRENEUR

Got questions? Check out our FAQs. http://www.scribd.com/faq

trackName: Scribd - Read Unlimited Books, eBooks, Documents, Magazines, Comics, Essays, Stories, Papers...
releaseNotes:
Audiobooks are here! More than 30,000 of them! This is the single biggest update to Scribd since we launched, and we couldn't be more excited (in case you couldn't tell). On top of that, we've also streamlined and beautified the way you find, store & read your books.

~ What's new in 3.8.1 ~

• New! More than 30,000 audiobooks now available for your listening pleasure.
• Completely redesigned interface & easy book storage make organizing your reading life a breeze.
• Styling improvements make your books look better than ever.
• Opening a book now takes you straight to the text so you can jump right in.
• Improved syncing so all your devices play nicer together.
